assembled_prompt_text:
# Anamalia Film Bible v1.0.0

## Global Visual Constants

### Camera System
- Lens: 35mm
- Height: Eye-level, tripod at 1m
- Angle: 5° downward tilt
- Framing: Consistent across all shots

### Lighting Setup
- Primary: Warm late-afternoon sunlight (4800K)
- Direction: Front-left at 45° angle
- Fill: Soft fill from right side
- Rim: Subtle rim light for depth
- Shadows: Diffused floor shadows

### Material DNA
- Body: Felted wool with visible fibers
- Eyes: Hyper-realistic, expressive
- Nose: Detailed, realistic texture
- Gestures: Human-style expressive movements
- Scale: Miniature stop-motion aesthetic

### Backdrop Geometry
- Floor: Matte off-white
- Wall: Matte off-white
- Junction: 90° angle where floor meets wall
- Shadows: Subtle contact shadows

### Color & Tone
- Contrast: Soft, gentle
- Palette: Warm, golden undertones
- Film Look: Ektachrome-style
- Mood: Nostalgic, handcrafted warmth

### Emotional Tone
- Atmosphere: Warm, optimistic, familiar
- Expressions: Humanlike but not exaggerated
- Energy: Gentle humor, nostalgia
- Craft: Handcrafted, artisanal feel

## Continuity Anchors
These elements must remain constant across all renders:
- Camera position and angle
- Lighting direction and temperature
- Material texture and feel
- Backdrop geometry
- Overall emotional tone. Arms wide, palms forward, weight centered, cheerful posture. a watermelon rind helmet. three Animal-Olympics Gold medals.. large blue buttons over her eyes. banana-print slacks. cardboard. an old airplane wing.. the wet earth after a rain.. dirty socks.. neon tennis balls. tattered teddy bears. soft-boiled eggs. (delete no-bake) banana cream pie.. escaping from a tank of strawberry jello. driving a railroad spike into her nostril.. imitating whale calls. playing sudoku with parrots. scone sommelier. climbed into her own hat. Miniature cobblestone piazza stage matte off-white wall meets floor at 90°. Warm directional sunlight 45° from front-left with soft fill and gentle rim light. Photographed with full-body, 35mm lens, eye-level, 1m height, 5° downward tilt.

tenner_descriptors: large blue buttons over her eyes
the wet earth after a rain.
escaping from a tank of strawberry jello
driving a railroad spike into her nostril.
